verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--gopīnātha, ihāñi rahibā
iṅho prasāda pāile, vārtā āmāke kahibā

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; gopīnātha—Gopīnātha; ihāñi rahibā—please stay here; iṅho—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; prasāda pāile—when he takes his lunch; vārtā—the news; āmāke kahibā—inform Me.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then told Gopīnātha, "Stay here and inform Me when Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya has taken his prasāda."
